author: josephperrott
message:

files.patch: @@ -14,6 +14,9 @@ Alex Rickabaugh, Andrew Kushnir, Andrew Scott, Doug Parker, Dylan Hunn, George K # 13.0.0 (2021-11-03) + +[Blog post "Angular v13 is now available"](http://goo.gle/angular-v13). + ## Breaking Changes ### common - The behavior of the `SpyLocation` used by the `RouterTestingModule` has changed
